content.detailedDescription:
On march 20th 2010 at about 9-930pm i was in my backyard setting up my telescope and i was outside about 15-20 minutes when i took my binoculars
and was looking at mars which was pretty much strait up in the sky when right in my view i saw 5 triangle shaped objects go right past my view going east to west. so i turned around and looked up and they were moving fast,and were out of my view in about 8 to 10 seconds. they made no noise at all and no they were not birds.
they almost blended in with the sky if they didnt go right through my view i would have never even noticed. they looked silverish black and didnt have any lights on them. they were in a tight v formation like a sqaud of fighter jets, its hard to tel there size or how high up they were but they were definently structured craft. this was in northeast baltimore city
right off of the 5900 block of bel air road. i saw a ufo about 8 years ago at loch raven resivior but i could have been mistaken, but this time there was absolutley no dout as to what i saw, it creeped me out but i was also amazed at the same time.
did anybody else see these things?? ive looked around online and havent found anything yet. im hoping at least somone else saw what i did?
i know i will never forget it..
content.summary: 5 triangle shaped craft in a tight v formation.

content.detailedDescription:
We were watching for the satelite and it was a bright clear night full of stars. first craft appeared and floated towards bishop airport. second craft did the same. we contacted bishop airport about this incident and given a number to call in detroit. they were not interested about this and blew my mother off. 

after this, the next day our phone went dead. we have comcast cable with interent,phone and cable t.V. we have had the same setup for around 4 years never with any issues. only our phone went dead.

the cable man said it had something to do with the splitters but as i am very handy with computers and it things related, i had checked these myself and there were no issues that i could see.

i just recently found this website and figured you guys would be interested in it. my mother and her boyfriend are the ones who witnessed this and she would be more then happy to explain it to someone who will actually listen and take her seriously.

if anybody else in michigan witnessed this it would be great to hear from you also and compare notes. however, my mother and her boyfriend did not have the video camera out. 

thank your for reading and good luck with everything you are doing. hopefully it won't take to long for the government to tell us the truth about this instead of covering up every bit of evidence. 

thanks again.

sincerely,

jordan
content.summary: Very large, grey triangle shaped object floating in the sky above us with no sound and no lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east bound on hwy 90 when i saw a street light looking light in the sky. i thought it was just a street light on the horizon, but as i came up over the hill i saw the light was high in the sky. as soon as i got a good glimpse of it, the light dissapeared. then a few seconds later about 5 or 6 more lights appeared forming a widening half circle until they dissapeared as well. my brother said it was c130 flares, but i looked on youtube to see what those looked like, and the lights i saw were much much much bigger and the direction in which the lights i saw resemble nothing of the c130 flare videos i saw.
content.summary: Crazy light display in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Two of us were driving rte 6a in truro, ma heading towards provincetown sometime after sunset to our left (west) -  it was approx. 7:20pm. it was a nearly cloudless evening, with a thin moon and a few stars starting to become visible. it was unusually mild for this time of year. as we looked north/northwest toward provincetown we could see a very bright light, larger than a star, over the bay which looked stationary. as we watched the seemingly low and bright light flicker slightly, a small wispy cloud out was drawing near to it and we thought we could now determine how high up it really was. the light was not obscured by the cloud and was in fact in front of it eliminating the star theory we were debating. once getting into provincetown proper and waiting at a light at conwell st./ rte 6a, we could see that it was now moving slowly and heading towards us from near the airport. thinking it was a low plane or helicopter we parked our car in our driveway about a minute later and jumped out to watch it. the light passed directly over us. it was solid, not blinking, and large compared to lights seen on high altitude international and military flights in the distance and completely silent. it "drifted" overhead and had no faa lights. at this point it was very dark out with no residual light from the sunset. as the light went in a southernly direction back over the bay it began to dim, leaving a sort of yellow glow to it like a street light and then shut off abruptly. we didn't see it thereafter. strangely, inside our house ten minutes later the little speakers for ipods snapped on mysteriously as we were sitting down. the unit has a little lcd screen that suddenly lit up. it's never done that and we found that odd and somewhat fitting to the situation. i called the police and the airport two days later since nothing seemed to match what we saw. nothing odd reported. i did take a picture on my iphone and it caught the light but not much detail. can send if interested.
content.summary: Bright, silent and low flying light seen over provincetown

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my wife to work. she worked the 12-8 shift. therefore i know the exact time within one minute. as i dropped my wife off at her work i continued on past her building to turn around. just as i started to go up a small hill to make the turn, i was driving a four wheeled atv, i saw directly in front and above me, where there had been complete darkness, lights appearered. these lights were in a circular pattern and i could see individual lights, i cannot say for sure how many there were because they immediately began to spin and became one big light. the object then began to move very rapidly away from me going almost due west. in so doing it left a trail of light similar to a shooting star. that was my first impression a shooting star. but there is no way a shooting star could appear out of nowhere and be at that low altitude. i cannot say for sure the exact altitude but it appeared to be only at the most two hundred feet above me. the clarity of the lights when they appeared and the width of the trail it left could only mean that it was very low. all i saw were the lights i was unable to see anything else or even a shadow of a shape. it happeded so fast and i was unable to believe what i was seeing. it was a dark night with a little cloud but very clear. 

i was uanble to sleep until after 2am. all i could think about was what i had seen. i kept seeing these lights appear and start spinning and then fly off at such a fast speed that it looked like a comet. it was very unbelievable but something that i will never forget.

i hope that someone else may have seen something similar around this time. i would love to know that i was not the only one seeing this object. i would also love to have been able to get a picture of it.
content.summary: Lights appeared directly in front of me and sped off.

content.detailedDescription: Jay hicks report #3. paul hicks field investigator mufon iowa. more attachments.
content.summary: Woke up between 12 and 2 am. loud roar, colored lights coming down outside. thought to go and look and it shot back up.

content.detailedDescription: [cms/tg/pid] report #2. i didn't know i couldn't go back into the report and add details. report filed by [cms/tg/pid] field investigator mufon iowa. mufon questionnaire filled out 4/1/1989 and signed by [cms/tg/pid] the article in the omaha world herald says the other sightings were made after 2:30 am. the area of the sighting has hills and powerlines. there is a cliff to the dump ne of the trailer and "j" said the horses didn't go off. "j" said the sound was like a turbine (electromagnetic generator), anti magnetic, generating a field against the earth. he said he read in the papers the next day (omaha world herald?) there were other sightings, police involved. the ashland gazzette comes out twice a week. after he was on the road he read the paper 10-12 days later. his memory about the actual event is unclear. another version: got up, moving around in the house while going on. don't remember what happened. was going to look and that's all i remember. at first, went back to sleep. later, blacked out, don't remember. (ashland, nebraska schirmer hwy 6) heard about shirmer, no details. "j" has never read a ufo book. i have talked to "j" about ufo's and some about abductions. hypnosis? "yes. i'll try it. you may get a real weird story out of me. i knew it was there. i knew it was there". "j" is religious and believes god could have made more creatures. never believed before. "something's going on. we're too primitive". "j" said police chief dimmit saw ufo's and it was in the paper. he was kidded by people. in an interview 8/10/2009 "j" again described his sighting. this time he saw the object. (memory fill-in?, recovered memory?) loud whine like a jet engine. round-big. 130' across arena so object barely fit. 4 legs, 2 wheels on ends (dual round things). dust was blown away in the arena, bare spot. cop everyone made fun of, he saw one same night. lights? thinking-no lights on it. skin of object lit up. light blue/grey. whole object bright. bedroom noise. lights woke me up. looked out the window at it in the arena-went back to sleep. thought he was dreaming. my dreams are crazy-this was real. drawing "j" made of object is in attachments. another sighting: 3/2/1990 6:45 pm. "j" and his wife were at their daughter's house. looked like 5 dimes shiny, turned on edge. evenly spaced. "weird". 2 jet trails through them.
content.summary: Woke up between 12 and 2 am. loud roar, colored lights coming down outside. thought to go and look and it shot back up.

content.detailedDescription: I'm needing help and someone to contact me as soon as they can id rather not talk about my event and what i experianced online i feel it may indanger me. i was visited by what i believe is to be a grey and i need to speak with somone very soon
content.summary: I'm not reporting a ufo sighting this is an experience with what i've found out to be after research a grey.

content.detailedDescription:
Time:               20:15 date: 03-20-2010
location:           lemonwood neighborhood oxnard, california
weather conditions: clear

 me, my wife and a friend were out sitting, waiting for the iss to pass (n to ese) approx. and looking north near the horizon for it. just prior to the iss we saw a bright white meteor going from the east towards approx nne at approx 40 degrees off the horizon. how long? (two feet @ arms length) for 2 seconds or so. (it was bright) i'm sure we were not the only ones to have seen this or the coming phenomenon. if they did kept looking they saw it also. after the meteor burned up there was a faint glowing object in that immediate area, possibly "flat, round or both" (couldn't tell even with binoculars) i could not focus on it. it blocked out stars as it passed! got within a few degrees of mars. it was big and not an airplane. so close we would have heard it had it been a plane. we observed this object moving to the east (in the direction the meteor had came from) then it changed directions abruptly 5 or 6 times over five minutes or so, going back and forth, up and down until we lost it. actually "zig zagging".
 not moving any faster than the iss seems to move (for reference), it's just that it did these abrupt turns with no noise, no lights (or running lights) just this very faint glow. if you were to look up at any time of any night this would not catch your attention. we were looking for the iss then got the meteor vista, then the ufo.? i cant seem to find anyone who saw it also. i am freaked out a bit and this is not my first sighting. not a ufo buff but i love the heavens.
content.summary: Meteor / ufo

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out in the back yard to go to the bathroom and notice a very bright star and as i was looking at it i saw it double in size. again and again and again until it was right up on earth ! i gaze at the stars all the time and would say this thing was at least 2 or 4 hundred thousand miles from earth and was close to half the size of our moon!It sat there for about 20 seconds then zoomed away so fast that it look like a rock sipping acros a pond and it skiped about 16 to 18 times before it was gone out in space !    it was so bright that for two days evry time i closed my eyes i could still see it as if it was still there. the ship was disc like in shape but had very bright purple lines on top that cross the ship from top to bottom and this might sound weird but the purple was briter then the white part of the ship!I can say that i know with out a blink of an eye that we are not alone.I'am sending this to you two years later in case some one came to you with the same claime but no way to prove it.So if there description matches mine then you know they are not bsing you.And ido not want to be on tv. i dont care if people beleive it or not . i know for my self .
content.summary: Look like a star far away then about every 3 seconds it got biger and biger  until it was right  there close too earth !

content.detailedDescription: Around 11:48 to 11:57 p.M. eastern time i witnessed 10 - 12 red sphere like objects moving in an irregular line formulation. i was ready to close up my store when my brother called telling me excitedly that there were a group of bright objects within the sky. i went out to look at the scene and there were these objects, moving northwest from my initial point. my two fellow employees came out to see the objects, as did the last three customers we were helping. on taft st. nearby drivers stopped and got out of their cars to look at the objects. these objects were red with yellow on the bottom, at times blinking. there were no sounds being omitted from them, unlike when a jet airliner passes overhead at 10, 000 ft. my brother explained to me that he first saw the objects moving in a single file line, then breaking apart still being somewhat behind one another. upon seeing the objects i began to run across the plaza parking lot, keeping my phone on so that i could get my brother's view from where he was. by the the time i had crossed the end of the lot the last two objects began crisscrossing one another, never hitting one other. finally the very last one appeared to elevate into the atmosphere, becoming dimmer as it reached higher elevations. my coworker believed it was a meteor shower penetrating into the earth's atmosphere; however, these objects were moving below low level clouds the entire time i was out there. when i got home i immediately called the local police dept. of pembroke pines and hollywood to see whether anyone had already reported the sightings, which no one did. my brother saw the same with the remaining items, saying that they all had ascended into the atmosphere. for me this was the most amazing sight i've ever seen, for i've been interested in this subject since my years in middle school. if anyone else saw the same thing please let me know, for i would like to get another individual's perspective.
content.summary: 10 - 12 red sphere objects were moving northwest through cities hollywood and pembroke pines

content.detailedDescription:
Hi i was driving towards roswell, new mexico saturday night from spring break vacation���about 200 miles west of roswell (the city i was approaching before i saw the ufo was pretty big���it might���ve been albuquerque���but don���t quote me on that)���when all of a sudden in the upper left hand corner of my windshield i saw an amber-colored orb. right when i looked up at it it zipped across the sky, immediately stopped���as if inertia had no effect on it, zipped across the sky again, immediately stopped, zipped again across the sky and disappeared. when it zipped off into the distance the last time and disappeared, it had a light trail that followed behind it���similar to the warp fx in the original star trek tv series.

i���m attaching a picture that i drew of the experience, labeled and everything.
content.summary: Amber orb shoots across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 19th, 2010, i walked outside my condo in west linn, oregon to walk the dog at around 8:00 p.M. it  was completely dark except for the stars and the crescent moon - there were no clouds in the sky. instantly i heard dogs barking and howling in the northwest direction of the neighborhood, but my dog remained silent (he's not a me-too barker). right away i looked up in the sky as i always do when i go outside, and to my left i saw a low-flying vehicle that was coming from the southeast direction and heading northwest. i estimate it being between 50 to 75 yards up in the sky. it was close enough that i saw the bottom of the metal triangular shaped vehicle. i was thinking it would hit some trees or crash because it was so low, but apparently it didn't. i could see the bottom of this jet-sized vehicle, but it was triangle shaped and didn't look like a plane or jet. it was at least 75 feet long. after wards, when i stretched my arm out where i saw the vehicle before, it was the size of my hand (woman's hand). there were bright orange lights on the bottom. i watched it zoom by at about 100 miles an hour - it looked like a fast moving car speed. i could only watch the vehicle between the trees, probably for about 5 seconds max. my dog and i ran to see if we could see anything on the other side of the trees but it was nowhere in sight. the dogs kept barking when the vehicle passed over in their direction. it was so silent, my dog didn't even look up.

sideline, when i told my husband how low this ufo was flying, he didn't think it was possible without hitting the trees. so my first report said 100 yards up. but as i was driving on the freeway the following day i noticed all the tallest street lights that are always next to certain areas of the freeway - the ones that have three lights on them. there are also shorter lights but i'm talking about the tallest ones. the tallest lights were how low the craft was flying. when i checked out the path in the daylight, there was plenty of room for it to fly that low without hitting any trees. i don't know how anybody else did not see this strange siting, but nobody else was in site. i'm tempted to go door-to-door and ask other neighbors if they saw anything.

right away i called the local tv channels. the only one that had a live person to talk to said, "that's kind of funny that you'd report that today because it's the spring equinox and you could have seen a reflection from the northern lights. this was no reflection but rather a solid, industrial strength vehicle.     

i sent this information to the local oregon mutual ufo network. tom bowden responded right away and will send a local rep to interview me. however, he thought i should also send this information your way. 

please give me a call or email me if you have any other questions. there were no pictures. even if i had a camera it all happened so fast i wouldn't have been able to take the picture in time. i guess i wasn't expecting such a surprise.

thanks for your help and please keep my name, phone and email address anonymous.
content.summary: Low-flying ufo siting in west linn, oregon

content.detailedDescription:
On march 26, 1995, i left las vegas about 2:30 am and traveled in my pick-up driving south on highway #95.  i was driving a little nissan pick-up. my shift ended at 2:00 am at a casino that morning in las vegas, and i was eagerly going to drive to laughlin, nevada to see the love of my life.  he was the graveyard floor person for the ramada express.  i was driving south on #95 and was fast approaching searchlight and cal-nev-ari.  i was not yet to the junction in the road where you need to make a decision - you can either keep going straight on #95 on the way to needles, california, or you can turn left on the way to laughlin, nevada.
 
this is the honest to god truth, and i have never forgotten the moment.  the moment i arrived in laughlin, i wrote about this in my journal (which i always kept with me).  it was absolutely pitch dark.  a two-lane highway, one lane going south (the one i was on) and one lane going north.  it was such a beautiful clear night that you could see all the stars.  when i first noticed it, i saw it high in the dark sky right in the middle of all the stars.  i thought, "my god!  what is that?"  i couldn't take my eyes off of it, and i could see it was coming closer and closer towards me in a northerly direction, straight out of the stars getting lower and lower towards the highway.  i was now seeing the real shape of it, and still it was just all flames.  it was rectangular - all fire - about twice as wide as a box car, twice as long, but not as high.  it was coming so fast towards me, steady as it went.  i remember those few seconds as it got closer and closer thinking, "so this is it?  this is how i'm going to die?"  it was as if it was going to hit me head on.  it was almost level with my truck on the road.  it seemed like it got to only a few feet from hitting me head on, and then it suddenly dipped upwards with just enough space to clear my truck and it just kept on going, never once coming into contact with me.  i was so amazed - like in two seconds, it scooted upwards and went right over the top of my truck, just clearing it, and it kept on going north as i was headed south.  i was like in a state of shock.  the only thing i could think of was that something was "checking me out."  it was like when teenagers are zooming around showing off in their speeding cars and they zoom up to you and check you and your car out, and then they zoom off.

once it went above and over me, i was so afraid i shook.  i never looked back - i was just glad it didn't destroy me.  i couldn't believe what just happened, but it was true.  it actually happened.  i just kept driving, and driving, all the time praying that it would leave me alone, whatever it was.  i was the only vehicle on the road coming or going.  it was shortly after that, that i came to the junction where i turned left and headed towards laughlin, nevada.

just 2 weeks ago, i found that journal that was in storage.  i was so very happy to find it and search for the exact morning that it happened.  i have wanted to report this since that day of march 26, 1995, and now i have done so.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: A fireball appeared far away in the sky, speeding towards me as i drove south. fire -rectangular shape twice the width & length of a box car, but not as tall.  100 feet from hitting me head on, it rose up slightly just clearing my vehicle & cont'd north.

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbor and i were going to meet outside to look at the stars with our telescopes.  as i stepped outside, my neighbor told me to look up.  he mentioned that maybe there was a satellite flying over head. immediately, i realized this object was way too low to be a satellite.  

what i saw was flying from the north-northwest towards the south-southeast.  its entire body was made of a white light and had a diamond-like shape.  to the left, right, up, and down were 4 very bright green "spikes" or "protrusions".  the white and green lights were unmistakable.  in addition, there was no sound at all.  we compared later airplanes flying by and their sounds to the fact that this object had no sound at all. 

i did look at it through binoculars but by them time my wife brought them to me, it was a little late and then i wasn't able to get a good, tight look at it.

as an amateur astronomer, i have seen many odd objects in the night sky.  not only that but since we live close to an air force base and the atl airport, there is always a lot of air traffic in my area.  however, this particular one was nothing like i've ever seen. at the moment there were no other aircraft to our knowledge. the only thing about this craft that was "normal" was the fact that it moved in a straight line at a regular pace.  

normally, i would not have bothered reporting this but after my neighbor and i spoke about it, i feel confident this craft was not anything we consider "normal".
content.summary: Diamond-shaped white light body craft with bright green spikes

content.detailedDescription:
During a night skywatch on march 18, 2010 i noticed a white glowing solid object heading east to west. what was intriging was how slow, low and silent it was gliding over the houses. this object appeared very different from normal air traffic here. i see planes and helicopters nightly and counted dozens of these before this sighting came along.I was on the phone with eugene erlikh at the time of the sighting. 
i could have made this video shorter, i do realize there is a gap where i am struggling to get the object to show up on film. i have never had these kinds of problems with my camcorder before. it seemed as the object got closer and was nearest to me my camcorder was malfunctioning. i tried everything to get the camcorder to right itself. so i left this long version in to show others why during a potential ufo sighting camcorders can experience technical difficulties. 
what is interesting is the end of the video when i finally do get the object back into focus, it has taken on the form of 2 seperate objects with the fake blinking lights. to add more..The dog at the neighbors house just as the object passes over starts barking repeatedly.
when a real airplane is filmed especially at that low of an altitude, one can clearly see the structured craft itself. there seemed to be none on this object. only glowing lights mimicking our conventional aircraft.
i have been following the alison kruse and others fake plane sightings. i didn't know what to make of it completely. after seeing this object, i am convinced there are objects that come out at night that cruise around the neighborhood, mimicking conventional aircraft.
the general public knows what is conventional aircraft in the skies. debunkers and skeptics who try to scare people away from skywatching and passing on vital information.
i know what i saw.
to make this sighting more interesting, about 15 minutes later a glowing orange orb ( i am thinking it was the same one) came from the direction where this one just went. it headed southeast. it was even lower in the sky, made no noise and glowed. this will be clearly be seen in part 2. 
in the second sighting that happened about 15-20 minutes later was even better. this object was so bright gold glowing and the camcorder doesn't do it justice at all. it was bright. moving west to south east even lower over the neighborhood. so low that it was seen through the smaller trees in the front yards. it was also silent. i do not know if this was the same object. this one glowed bright gold, the other did not. one can even see the glow seems to be coming from underneath the orb and expanding out. it was very bright. these objects make no noise. i have filmed helicopters that close and they are extremely loud, please see my other videos for reference. this object, had it been a helicopter, would have been audible on film i don't know what these things were. i know what they weren't. i don't care what some people's conclusions are regarding these videos.I don't care if some people don't believe me. i know there are alot more people all over the world seeing these orbs in the night sky. i want to report my sightings so that it encourages others seeing these objects to come forward with video photos ect, to corroberate this phenomenon. mankind has a right to know. it is real and it is happening whether you believe or not. i tried to send the original footage from my pc but i think the file may be too big. here's the youtube links:
part 1 : http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=s-8oxneodaq

part 2: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=vgkvgts-ht4
content.summary: 2 ufo orb lights within minutes of each other

content.detailedDescription:
10:30 pm -- my husband was flying into ithaca airport and noticed what he thought of as a bright planet off to the southwest.  particularly bright and had colors changing.

 

11:15 - 11:45 pm  -- at home (in ithaca) i (independently) noticed the same bright object out my window to the southwest, low on the horizon.  i would have just thought it to be a bright planet, but for the fact that it's light was such that it changed colors -- going from typical "star-like" colors to blue and green, maybe red (hard to recall).  kind of a pulsating quality to the light.  and the colors were not vibrant but you could make out the change in color. the colors never lasted too long before changing to another color.  

 

it was moving with the "speed" typical of a celestial object -- i took note of it as it was "setting" over a neighbor's roof.  i got online to see if there were any celestial objects i should be looking for in the night sky.  

 

frankly, i would just chock it off to strange atmospheric conditions.  however, with the cleveland/euclid ufo sighting about the same time, i thought i'd let you folks know about this as well.

 

 a friend also saw this same object a few nights later (monday or tuesday), however, his time is not as pinned down  (9-10pm maybe) as mine and according to him, the direction was more westerly.
content.summary: Bright object in sw sky

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i stopped at the byerleys grocery store in roseville, mn approx 2pm sunday march 21st 2010. got out of the car to go in and i happened to look north as i exited the car. i noticed an object, which i first thought was any common plane, and then immediately noticed that it looked strange. there were no apparent wings and certainly no tail. if i had to guess the approximate length i would say 50 - 75 ft. it appeared to be not much higher than 2000-3000 ft in the air moving from the nw to the se and maybe 1-1/2 miles away and absolutely silent. i pointed and asked my girlfriend to look and she saw the same thing. we both remarked at the relatively slow speed at which it was moving and the absence of wings, a tail or markings or sound. i noticed a couple of other people staring at it too. we followed it for maybe a minute and a half and it eventually faded from sight to our s.E. i did take a couple pictures with my phone camera, but unfortunately they don't show much more than a small white object that's not very clear.
i've lived in mpls for twenty years and have seen countless numbers of aircraft, blimps, etc but have never seen anything like it. what made it so unusual was the lack of any sound and it was definitely not any sort of aircraft i've ever seen.
content.summary: White cigar shaped ufo, silent moving from nw to se

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the cell phone and while conversating i was looked out of my bathroom's open window. (my window looks right over teatro marcello in the center of rome.) it was dark and slightly foggy. there are usually plenty of planes flying over the city so i did not give much importance to this sighting at first. suddenly i notice that the object is flying at an unusually low altitude and at very low speed coming in my direction from the left. it is a red/orange light. bright but not blinding. the object flies horizontally at an average distance of 500 meters/ 1 km away from me and at about 150 mt. altitude, roughly; again, very slowly and almost halts approximately infront of my window. i tell the person on the other end of the line that im seeing something very strange in the sky and i start becoming emotional about it. he tells me to hang up and to take pictures of it. so i hang up and run in my room to get my camera but as i get back to record i decide not to because the object was slowly leaving and it wouldn't have showed well so i decided i wanted to enjoy it with my own eyes. meanwhile i am screaming to my mother in the other room to come and see. doing so i grab a potent green laser pointer i own. i point at the object with it while it is fading away on the right but nothing happens apart from it turning on and off rapidly in sequence and slowly fading away. she saw the same object fading away.

i felt a mix between fear and excitement that continued up until 3-4 hours later. i was in shock.
content.summary: Red-orange ufo flying over rome at low altitude and low speed no sound no conventional red and green lights present. ufo stopped and slowly left

content.detailedDescription: Last night at approximately midnight, i witnessed what i first thought was a night launch from cape canaveral. i'm located in south tampa and was looking east when i noticed a bright orange flame. my initial impression was a rocket booster flame but it didn't appear to be ascending. i just happened to be using a telescope and quickly turned it towards the object. it was a cylinder with a flame coming out one end. what was unusual about the object was that it appeared to be tumbling. like a spent rocket booster falling back to earth but this object was moving upwards. i tracked it for about 2 minutes as it rose up in the sky and then moved directly over head towards the west before disappearing in the clouds. the object was illuminated internally and moved quickly across the sky once it reached altitude.
content.summary: Witnessed a tumbling cylinder with an internal glow and a flame out one end.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend dan l. were at walnut beach sky watching. we noticed a bright object in the early morning sky. we focused my videocamera on it, centered the object on the video cameras screen then paid no attention to it. we then talked about what we had seen ealier that night over the lake, then turned back to the camera and noticed that the object had moved. we continued to observe the object until it suddenly disappeared.

we thought that the object could have been a star, or planet at first but quickly realized that the earth simply doesnt rotate fast enough to account for how far the object progressed across the sky, and even if it were a star or planet the path it would have followed acorss the sky would have been entirely different.

we then thought about the idea of the object being a aircraft, however i did not see any anti-collision, wing, or landing lights that were blinking at a timed interval on this object. the object appeared to be pulsating with no predetermined order and flashing an array of colors.
 i further concluded that the object could not have been a aircraft because the object was heading in a eastern heading towards the rising sun that was in the sky. if after the object lights went off the sunlight would have reflected off of the aircrafts fuselage. 

i am former air force, and i have been around a lot of different airframes, and i've seen many different aircraft in the sky, and i can identify all of the airframes the usaf currently has in service, along with the majority of thoes in the civilan sector on sight. however this object doesnt appear to be any airframe i am familar with. let alone the object has a extremely low airspeed which in most cases the majority of aircraft would have a very hard time trying to stay airborn at such a low speed.

anyways i eventually lost sight of the object when it suddenly disappeared from sight. i saw it disappear with my own eyes, an my friend saw it disappear on camera. we managed to capture the object disappearing on tape and we analyzed it frame by frame. i will be posting the videos link and the images link for the frame by frame breakdown below so you can see what we witnessed.


video link:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=bapdtd7ozqk


frame by frame breakdown:
http://s773.Photobucket.Com/albums/yy20/robertg87/?Action=view���t=d6eae89c.Pbw

equipment: 
jvc everio with tripod
content.summary: Bright object disappearing in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep one night and had a dream that something came into my room and sat near the head of the bed, talking to me while i was sleeping.  i then talked back to it in my dream and woke myself up doing so. in that instance i heard a motorized sound and then the bathroom door slammed shut very hard. my father and kids all woke. has anyone out there have this exsperience?
content.summary: Alien contact?

content.detailedDescription: I was at a nearby park stargazing when i noticed a huge flaming ball in the sky toward the east it stayed bright for about 5 minutes in the same spot then slowly started to dim. it blinked 3 times then started moving. then another one came into view (another craft) in the same position the first was one originally. then i turned around and the first craft seemed to circle the park i was at. then i looked where the 2nd craft was and it dimmed like the other one, blinked and flew directly over the park. they flew around for 5-10 more minutes then disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle with white lights at each corner

content.detailedDescription: At 8:19 p.M. i was in the yolo fairgrounds at a local event. as i was sitting, watching the sky a white "ball" or "sphere" or "orb" of light caught my attention. when i first noticed the light it seemed to be moving in a downward direction, down toward the horizon line. after about a second it abruptly changed direction - which brought me to my feet. the downward angle would have been 120 to 140 degrees and the direction change would have been upward at 90 degrees. the light was brighter than any star i could compare it too and there were no flashing or other lights attached that i could see. the light traveled completely over my head to a nearly identical opposite position in the sky and vanished almost in an instant, i'd say it seemed to fade for 1 or 2 seconds. from inside the fairgrounds i couldn't tell north, south, east, or west. i drew several others to pay attention to it, my brother, and his wife were the only two that i knew. all were in concurrence that if this were any typical aircraft the light would have somehow changed or dropped out of view as it passed over head. the light remained constant until it vanished; i marked the time at 8:21. there wasn't a lot of background noise, some idle chatter, but i heard no noise that i could relate to an aircraft.
content.summary: Ball of light travels across night sky, then vanishes

content.detailedDescription: Having a party in my back yard, which started around 4:30, a girlfriend spotted it and asked what it was. witnessed by at least 25 people, silloetted by the sun, hovering with no sound. hovered for at least 3 to 4 minutes, cloud came over, when cloud moved on object disappered. never saw it leave.Object was sort of bell shaped.Asked some individuals what they thought it was months later and they did not want to acknowledge they saw anything. one guy thinks it was time travelers.Tried to get video of the object but it disappered befor i could. i feel it was a ufo, only wish i could of obtained video of the object.
content.summary: Bell shaped, sillouetted by the sun, no sound, hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the park with my wife and dogs.  i took random pictures of the sky.  i do this from time to time.  i did not see the pictures untill today.
content.summary: Horse hoof like ufo

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:15 pm pst a group of three individuals witnessed a large bright white spherical light moving in a southerly direction towards the city of santa barbara. the individuals were facing in the southerly direction when they noticed the light at their 11 o'clock. the object emitted no sound. its size was approximately one eighth of the visible moon surface and equal in brightness. it had no visible blinking lights. the individuals watched the object for approximately 40 seconds. from the viewpoint of the individuals the object traveled from their 11 o'clock to 9:30 coming from out of a notherly direction. the object then appeared to fade at the 9:30 position rather than continuing on a more "natural" orbital course. the location of the viewpoint is in the foothills north of santa barbara between hwy 154 and the 101 just off san marcos rd. the skies appeared clear. the temperature was roughly 58 degrees farenheit.
content.summary: Bright lite over santa barbara

content.detailedDescription: I was watching westward from my patio again like last night when i noticed a star like light coming from the western night sky, i observed for about 10 15 seconds and ran in to tell my wife to come and see, when we returned to the patio we both seen the starlight smoothly gliding towards us but then it took a gradual but definite southerly direction and seconds later it began to dissipate, the light becoming smaller, upon disappearing there was a red burn flash, and it was gone, interesting to note though was before it took a turn to the south there was a flight that had taken off from sky harbor heading in a westerly north direction and i know the pilot / passergers had to have seen it.
content.summary: Light appears from the west, curves south gradually disappears, red burn flash

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the back alley taking a break at the downtown restaurant that i work at. as i sat down i began skywatching. looking at the clouds, i just happened to notice a white dot high in the sky. at first i thought it was a bird but as i kept watching i noticed that the object appeared to not be moving and at an extremely high altitude. 

at that time an airliner happened to be traveling in the same direction, and still this object appeared to be thousands of feet higher than the jet.  as i continued to watch i noticed that the object was very slowly moving across the sky from the southeast to the northwest. this object was high above the clouds, and i continued to watch it until i could no longer see due to buildings obstructing my view.
content.summary: Orb-like ufo at extreme high altitude
